label: China Equities
thesis: Long-term overweight on Chinese equities driven by industrial innovation, domestic consumption transition, and technology catch-up dynamics.
riskNotes: Policy shifts, geopolitical pressure, and FX volatility can materially affect returns.

label: US Equities
thesis: Selective exposure to US market leaders in productivity, software infrastructure, and global platforms while avoiding crowded narratives.
riskNotes: Valuation compression and policy regime changes can lead to sharp drawdowns.

label: Europe Export Leaders
thesis: Focus on globally competitive European businesses with diversified revenue outside domestic demand constraints.
riskNotes: Regulatory burden and weak regional growth may reduce multiples and earnings momentum.

label: Crypto Core
thesis: Core positions in Bitcoin and Ethereum with tactical exposure to cash-flow-generating DeFi protocols.
riskNotes: Extremely high volatility, regulatory uncertainty, and protocol-specific risks remain structural.

label: Commodities and Precious Metals
thesis: Strategic allocation to gold, silver, and selected commodity trends as macro and inflation hedges.
riskNotes: Commodity cycles are nonlinear and sensitive to real rates and global demand shocks.

label: Uranium and Nuclear Value Chain
thesis: Bullish structural exposure to uranium and civil nuclear innovation, including SMR-linked opportunities.
riskNotes: Execution risk, permitting timelines, and political narratives can delay thesis realization.
